metadata.dc:description: The present document reviews various aspects of the current status of cardiac resynchronization therapy: mechanisms of action, current indications and implantation technique.
metadata.dc:title: Estado actual de la terapia de resincronización cardiaca.
[Current status of cardiac resynchronization therapy].
